001package com.github.nradov.abnffuzzer;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004
005import org.junit.Test;
006
007/**
008 * Test of fix for issue 2. Due to the complexity of this specification,
009 * successful test execution with the <code>action-stmt</code> rule may require
010 * increasing your JVM's stack size; for Oracle this can be done with the
011 * <code>-Xss</code> <i>size</i> option. Thus this test currently uses the
012 * simpler <code>range-arg</code> rule.
013 * 
014 * @author Damian ONeill
015 * @author Nick Radov
016 * @see <a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7950" target="_">RFC 7950</a>
017 * @see <a href="https://github.com/nradov/abnffuzzer/issues/2" target="_">No enum constant com.github.nradov.abnffuzzer.Terminal.Radix.s</a>
018 */
019public class YangTest {
020
021        @Test
022        // TODO: this method sometimes takes an extremely long time to execute
023        public void testGenerateAscii() throws IOException {
024                final Fuzzer rfc7950 = new Fuzzer(this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("/rfc7950.txt"));
025                for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
026                        rfc7950.generateAscii("range-arg");
027                }
028        }
029
030}
